item.description:
Howdy Partnas!
Grab your boots & hats, saddle up your ponies, and mosey on down to the
WEST SIDE SOCIAL CLUB at 4 Harrington Court, Wakefield MA
Saturday October 2, 2010 at 7:00pm

what for you ask?
When TORNADO TERRY & THE TWISTERS (in memory of Twister Larry)
Will Show You How to do Country Right!

There'll be plenty of Chow! We'll "Boot Scoot" the night away to the tunes of
Country DJ's Christine & John, http://www.rossdj.com...
And so that you won't tangle up your "left" & "right" hooves,
Cowgirl Kathie will give country Line Dance Lessons

And, as if that weren't enough...
There'll be Door Prizes & Raffles...

So, come on down Cowboys & Cowgirls, and ALL you want-a-be Cowboys & Cowgirls

Tickets $15, available in Advance at the West Side Social Club bar OR at the door

Yeeeee-Haw!!!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Country Western Social
